name: Stone Crab Claws with Mustard Dipping Sauce
description: [Photograph: Carrie Vasios] Check out other recipes from Serious Entertaining: To Have or Have Not »...
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon hot sauce, such as Frank's

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, whisk together ingredients for dipping sauce until well combined.
For serving: Pour dipping sauce into a small bowl. Place dipping bowl on a large plate and fan crab claws around the circumference.
Note: Stone crab claws are sold already cooked, making them a great party dish.
